attributes.description: Collects browser history from all supported browsers, filtering out common legitimate domains to reduce noise for forensic investigations. IMPORTANT: Requires Elastic Agent v9.3.0+. Automatically discovers Chrome, Edge, Firefox, and Safari histories without ATC configuration. Returns potentially suspicious URLs with timestamps, titles, browser names, user profiles, and navigation context. Cross-platform (Windows, macOS, Linux). MITRE ATT&CK: T1217 Browser Bookmark Discovery.
attributes.query:
-- Browser history from Elastic osquery extension
-- Supports: Chrome, Edge, Firefox, Safari
-- Filters out common legitimate domains to surface suspicious/malicious activity
-- MITRE ATT&CK: T1217 Browser Bookmark Discovery
SELECT
  datetime AS event_time,
  url,
  title,
  browser,
  user AS username,
  domain,
  transition_type
FROM elastic_browser_history
WHERE
  -- Filter out known legitimate domains (allowlist)
  regex_match(
      domain,
      '^(.*\\.)?(' ||
      -- Search engines
      'google\\.com|google\\.co\\.[a-z]{2}|googleapis\\.com|gstatic\\.com|bing\\.com|yahoo\\.com|duckduckgo\\.com|baidu\\.com|yandex\\.ru|' ||
      -- Microsoft ecosystem
      'microsoft\\.com|microsoftonline\\.com|office\\.com|office365\\.com|windows\\.net|windows\\.com|live\\.com|outlook\\.com|azure\\.com|visualstudio\\.com|' ||
      -- Apple ecosystem
      'apple\\.com|icloud\\.com|itunes\\.com|' ||
      -- Amazon/AWS
      'amazon\\.com|amazon\\.co\\.[a-z]{2}|amazonaws\\.com|aws\\.amazon\\.com|' ||
      -- Social media
      'facebook\\.com|fb\\.com|instagram\\.com|twitter\\.com|x\\.com|linkedin\\.com|reddit\\.com|pinterest\\.com|tiktok\\.com|snapchat\\.com|whatsapp\\.com|discord\\.com|telegram\\.org|' ||
      -- Video/Streaming
      'youtube\\.com|youtu\\.be|netflix\\.com|hulu\\.com|disneyplus\\.com|twitch\\.tv|vimeo\\.com|spotify\\.com|soundcloud\\.com|' ||
      -- Shopping/Commerce
      'ebay\\.com|walmart\\.com|target\\.com|bestbuy\\.com|etsy\\.com|shopify\\.com|paypal\\.com|stripe\\.com|' ||
      -- News/Media
      'cnn\\.com|bbc\\.com|bbc\\.co\\.uk|nytimes\\.com|reuters\\.com|wsj\\.com|theguardian\\.com|forbes\\.com|bloomberg\\.com|' ||
      -- Cloud/Storage
      'dropbox\\.com|box\\.com|onedrive\\.com|drive\\.google\\.com|' ||
      -- CDN/Infrastructure
      'cloudflare\\.com|akamai\\.net|akamaized\\.net|fastly\\.net|cloudfront\\.net|azureedge\\.net|cdnjs\\.com|jsdelivr\\.net|unpkg\\.com|' ||
      -- Developer/Tech
      'github\\.com|github\\.io|gitlab\\.com|stackoverflow\\.com|stackexchange\\.com|npmjs\\.com|docker\\.com|atlassian\\.com|atlassian\\.net|jira\\.com|bitbucket\\.org|mozilla\\.org|mozilla\\.com|' ||
      -- Business tools
      'slack\\.com|zoom\\.us|zoom\\.com|teams\\.microsoft\\.com|salesforce\\.com|hubspot\\.com|zendesk\\.com|intercom\\.com|notion\\.so|' ||
      -- Security vendors
      'elastic\\.co|splunk\\.com|crowdstrike\\.com|virustotal\\.com|malwarebytes\\.com|norton\\.com|mcafee\\.com|kaspersky\\.com|' ||
      -- Other common legitimate
      'wikipedia\\.org|wikimedia\\.org|archive\\.org|w3\\.org|jquery\\.com|bootstrapcdn\\.com|fontawesome\\.com|fonts\\.googleapis\\.com|recaptcha\\.net|googletagmanager\\.com|google-analytics\\.com|doubleclick\\.net|googlesyndication\\.com' ||
      ')$',
      0
  ) IS NULL
ORDER BY event_time DESC;
